talents.name: Primal Greed
talents.description: Your instincts for survival sharpen. All coin gains are permanently increased by 10%.

talents.name: Feral Affinity
talents.description: The whispers of the pack resonate deeper within you. All Wolf Reputation gains are permanently increased by 10%.

talents.name: Humanity's Charm
talents.description: You learn to better navigate the social constructs of the village. All Village Reputation gains are permanently increased by 10%.

talents.name: Lingering Knowledge
talents.description: Echoes of past lives remain. Start each new life with 100 XP in every skill.

Discipline.effect: Speeds up all skill XP gain.

Awareness.effect: Increases chances of positive night events.

Tracking.effect: Increases coin rewards from Human jobs.

Divination.effect: Provides hints about future events and unlocks lore.

Alchemy.effect: Unlocks the ability to create potions (future feature).

Feral Instinct.effect: Increases Wolf Reputation gain at night.

Intimidation.effect: Reduces Village Reputation loss from wolf activities.

Alpha Instinct.effect: A prestige skill for the pack leader.

nightEvents.name: Villager Lynch Patrol
nightEvents.flavor: Drunken villagers roam with torches, searching for signs of the beast.

human.flavor: You join the patrol, earning a bit of trust.

werewolf.flavor: You watch from the shadows as they pass, a smirk on your face.

nightEvents.name: A Child Gets Lost
nightEvents.flavor: A child has gotten lost in the woods!

human.flavor: You help the search party and find the child safe and sound. The village is grateful.

werewolf.flavor: The villagers whisper that the beasts of the forest are to blame.

nightEvents.name: Full Moon Transformation
nightEvents.flavor: The moon is full and bright. Your bones ache and twist beneath the silver light.

housingTiers.name: Torn Tent
housingTiers.description: A flimsy shelter. Better than nothing, but not by much.

housingTiers.name: Forest Lean-to
housingTiers.description: A crude but sturdy shelter built against a rock outcropping.

housingTiers.name: Rustic Cottage
housingTiers.description: A small, defensible cottage on the edge of the village.

housingTiers.name: Townhouse
housingTiers.description: A respectable home within the village walls.

housingTiers.name: Fortified Manor
housingTiers.description: A large, stone manor. A symbol of power and permanence.
